headline: Is Realty Income Set for Growth After Major Expansion in Retail and Industrial Properties?
summary: Ever wondered if Realty Income is truly a bargain right now, or just looks cheap on the surface? Let’s break down what’s priced in and what might be overlooked by the market. The stock is up 8.4% year-to-date and has gained 6.2% over the past year, despite a dip of 4.9% in the last month. This reflects ongoing shifts in investor sentiment and risk appetite. Recent headlines have focused on Realty Income’s continued expansion in the retail and industrial property sectors, including a major...

headline: Realty Income Announces £900 Million Sterling-Denominated Term Loan
summary: Realty Income Corporation (Realty Income, NYSE: O), The Monthly Dividend Company®, today announced that it has closed on a £900 million Sterling-denominated unsecured term loan. The loan initially matures in January 2028, before giving effect to one twelve-month extension option. Proceeds from the loan will be used to repay outstanding Sterling-denominated borrowings on our $4.0 billion multicurrency revolving credit facility, effectively pre-funding the refinancing of our January 2026 multi-cur
